attributes.action: Ban abortion or men don’t have to pay child support
attributes.additional_details: Double standard this is a disgrace
attributes.background: I want them to ban abortion or men don’t have to pay child support because it is not equal i will give a example  a women does not want a baby but her partner wants she can get rid of it easily by getting a abortion but if women wants a baby and a man does not he has to pay child support this is a

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
